DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether use 5-0 prolene repair linear cutaneous surgery wound improve scar cosmesis compare wound closure 5-0 fast absorb gut ( SOC ) .
DOC.brief_title: Use 5-0 Prolene Versus 5-0 Fast Absorbing Gut During Cutaneous Wound Closure
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether use 5-0 prolene repair linear cutaneous surgery wound improve scar cosmesis compare wound closure 5-0 fast absorb gut ( SOC ) . The investigator use split wound model , half wound treat 5-0 prolene half repair 5-0 fast absorbing gut . Three-months post-surgery , scar measure via physician observer scar assessment scale , validated scar instrument ( research procedure ) . The scar width adverse event record .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Able give inform consent Patient schedule cutaneous surgical procedure predict linear closure Willing return followup visit Mentally handicap Unable understand write oral English Incarceration Under 18 year age Pregnant woman Wounds predicted closure length le 3 cm
